messages.message: Hello dearest Italy. How goes things in your section of Europe?
messages.input: Message from ENGLAND:'Hello dearest Italy. How goes things in your section of Europe?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F NAP - ION, A ROM - APU, A VEN H. Should I trust ENGLAND?

messages.message: Italy? If you are available I have an offer for you.
